description:
The Amazon, having come from behind for a previous win
over Xana Star is looking to make a run for the
Welterweight crown. Getting better every week, the
Amazon still worries about facing the undefeated Ninja.
Outweighing her opponent by 20lbs the Amazon should
hold the advantage in height and weight. However,
never underestimate skill, ever!
title: The Ninja (2-0) vs. The Amazon (1-2)
